column5: Hi all,  CRAA, in partnership with many others including MNR, Toronto Sportsmen, Mississauga Bassmasters, IWFFC, CVC, and more will host a kid's fishin' day at Lake Aquitaine Saturday July 7, 2007 10 am until 1pm  CRAA has secured 200 rod and reel combo's, 200 jig kits for the rods and reels, 300 fishing booklets, 150 kids fishing day hats, 144 kids fishing day t shirts plus some additional odds and ends for the Kids fishing day to be given out on a first come first serve basis.  So come on out and enjoy and above all let the kids show us how its done
